messages.start:
Hi {}🤗

Experiencing Progress and Joy in the faith?...Awesome!💃🎉
Here's a couple of services I offer😁

• Daily Devotionals 📰
• Latest Sermons 🎶
• Get instant ticket notifications😱(Lagos branch Only)🔔
 and much more...

Excited?😋
Use the help button below to get started!

All sermons and devotionals gotten from
[Triumph30](triumph30.org) and [Celebration Church International](ccing.org)
messages.get_sermon:
Enter the title of the sermon you wish to get.

Click /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.tickets:
Yay🎉🎉.

Tickets are now available for {}!
Book your seat now!
messages.help:
Here's how the buttons below work

• latest sermon - Stream or download the most recent sermon
• get sermon - Get a specific sermon by title
• devotional - Get today's devotional

Other commands
• /mute - Mute notifications
• /unmute - Unmute notifications
messages.bc_help:
How to use broadcast types

• text - Send written text broadcast to all users
• photo - Send a photo with/without caption as broadcast.
• video - Send a video clip (must be less than 50mb) as broadcast with/without caption
• animation - Send short animated gif as broadcast with/without caption.
messages.mute:
You have muted notifications from CCI Bot 😞

You won't receive broadcasts from the bot henceforth.

Use /unmute to unmute notifications.
messages.broadcast:
Choose broadcast type📣📣
You can check out how to use broadcast by clicking the usage button below.

Use /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.bc:
Enter {} you want to broadcast:

Use /cancel to cancel operation.
messages.finished_broadcast:
Succesfully sent broadcast to {} users.

Total users: {}
messages.unmute:
Yay🎉

You have unmuted CCI Bot.
messages.empty:
😅No sermons found with title '{}'

 You can search for a keyword in the title or the full title.
